у моих братьев отсутствуют дыхательные пути

Очень хорошая игра с интересным сюжетом, продуманными персонажами и головоломками. Плюс в игре отличная графика для своих лет. Ещё мне понравилось приятное управление. Звуковое сопровождение в игре изумительное. Также здесь можно играть в комнаты созданные игроками или же создать собственные, что тоже понравилось и заинтересовало. И есть неплохой кооператив. Прошел за 11,7 часов. Определённо рекомендую.
все кайф с друзьями можно поиграть
einfach nur geil einfach kaufen es ist sooo spannend und gut es lagt nicht richtig gute grafik ist einfach beste

best puzzle game i've played so far
Great game, involves potato, details to the story and hints on how to beat the game.

This is one of the best games ever! Highly recommend. I am glad i have had the experience of playing this game.
One of my favourite games. The memories will stay with me for years :)
A very well-produced, humorous, brain-melting first-person puzzle game, with an equally excellent on-line 2P co-op campaign to boot.  I mean, if you've not heard of Portal by now..
Probably the best $2.90 I've spent on steam.

portal 2 ещё один шедевр valve.
 У игры хороший проработанный сюжет, графика на 2012 год очень хороша, по сравнению с 1 частью это игра просто шедевр.
 лично я прошёл её 4 раза (да это мало) и почти кооперативный режим.
 игра достойна на что  что-бы её купить!!

моя оценка 100/10 сюжет, графон, чёрный юмор и т.д. всё четкое 
если ещё  не играли то советую не пиратить очивкы класные
Прекрасная игра. Тут есть все: экшн, головоломки, шутки, киберпанк, эпичный боссфайт, сюжет. Единственное чего не хватает, это моих последних 2-ух извилин. Рекомендую

An extremely enjoyable puzzle-solving game with a great story to go with it.
Sehr interessantes Spiel mit sehr kreativer Story und vieler Rätsel! Das Spiel ist echt gut gemacht
i've seen some article that say its good for your math and physic skill
cool portal jumping teleport gel crazy robot lady and british ball
Es una perfecta secuela, se nota el detallismo grafico y la historia permanece siempre en plot twists, ademas que el multijugador en pantalla dividida es muy entretenido.
My favorite game on Steam yet. Possibly my favorite game, period.

This game is incredible and the graphics are way better than the year it was made says it should be. The puzzles are challenging and it takes me a bit to solve them every time. also i would like to add GlaDOS is my spirit animal. :)

This is an amazing game! i really liked the story and the co-op levels. the only thing i kinda wish was in the game is an option for 4 player co-op instead of just 2 player all the time. but overall its a really great game and you should try it out!
great physics, hilarious story, wonderful graphics even after nine years. I love this game.
Amazing continuation of the Portal story. Solid on both solo and 2-player content.

Portal 2, if you haven't gotten it, buy it. One of the most funny (assuming you like dark humor, if not still play this game.) puzzle games. Portal 2 is made by Valve Software so that means that it's good, Portal 2 also has bri'ish robot, so automatically 11/10.  The puzzles can be frustrating, and also can seem too easy, but I think that all games have shit parts and great parts. ("On A Rail" in Half-Life) So you should get this, but *P*L*A*Y* *P*O*R*T*A*L* *1*!* Play portal 1 first for some context and to understand different things, unfortunately Gabe Newell cannot count to 3, so there is no Portal 3. :(
seeing a robot being eaten by a potato proves that animals and nature are always above tech.
worse than Portal 1, but still great

Portal 2 ilk oyunun daha mükemmel ve daha fazla mekanik,çeşitlilik eklenmiş hali.İlk oyuna göre süre uzun ve mekanlar daha çeşitli bu da zevkinizi kırmadan devam ettirtiyor.Yeni puzzelar,mekanikler sayesinde sürekli ilerleyip daha fazla kafa yoruyorsunuz.Oyunun eğlenceli yönüde var ve hikayeside güzel.Online modunda rahatça güle oynaya takılabilirsiniz.İndirimde arkadaşınızla alın oynayın online modu sonra hikayeyi oynayın :3
Лучшая игра для того, что бы поссориться с другом из за кооп режима, советую.
fun and challenging best single player game ever (that ive played)

Very good game if you like puzzles and good story
It's Portal 2. The best of the best

i love this game, bought this one first before portal 1, but i love it. i really dont have much to say about it, but now that im talking about it, i just wanna say that the technology in this is so advanced that you can have a talking potato that doesnt like you but has to help anyway.

-¿Qué es lo que más te gusta del espacio? A mí, el espacio
-"¡ES-PA-CIO! ¡Ra, ra, ra! ¡ES-PA-CIO!"
-"¿Dónde estoy? Adivina, adivina, adivina. En el espacio."
-"¡Es el espacio!"
...
-"¡Es el espacio!"
-"¡ESPAAAAACIO!"
-"Me aburre el espacio."
-"Tierra."
-"Quiero la Tierra."
-"Quiero ir a la Tierra, quiero ir a la Tierra, quiero ir a la Tierra. A la Tierra."
-"No me gusta el espacio. Ya no."
-"Es demasiado grande. Quiero ir a casa. A la Tierra."

En cuanto al juego, jueguenlo ta bueno.
Fin del comunicado.
PD:¡Es el espacio!
